src/routes/blog/[slug]/+page.js
ts
import { error } from '@sveltejs/kit';


/** @type {import('./$types').PageLoad} */
export function load({ params }) {
	if (params.slug === 'hello-world') {
		return {
			title: 'Hello world!',
			content: 'Welcome to our blog. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet...'
		};
	}


	error(404, 'Not found');
}
